title: Clean the River
description: Sponsor a worker to help clean our local river and restore its natural beauty. Your donation funds equipment and fair wages for youth volunteers.

title: Sponsor School Kits
description: Help underprivileged children get access to essential school supplies. Each donation provides a kit with books, stationery, and a backpack.

title: Community Health Camp
description: Fund a youth-led health camp providing free checkups and medicines to the needy. Your support covers medical supplies and logistics.
